conversation.message_text: Apolis: Welcome to Apolis! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.
Apolis: Hey this is Sarah , how can I help you?
Do you still sell a large burlap market bag with both handles and a shoulder strap?
Apolis: We have several Market Bags here - https://apolis.attn.tv/aCMyegewstHO. Can you please let me know which one you are interested in?
I'm asking if you have one with handles as well as a shoulder strap
Apolis: This one comes with a handle and leather straps - https://apolis.attn.tv/abAO2J4oBS0w
The photo shows only handlesAnd I asked about a LARGE bag, not a petite

Apolis: My sincere apologies for the confusion. You can check out our only available market bags with both handles and shoulder straps here: https://apolis.attn.tv/ahXuEqNgV-dX, https://apolis.attn.tv/axeVEEtuUsQ-

Right now we don't offer others, however, I'll definitely pass this along to the team to consider in the future. Let me know if there's anything else you need.
Thank you
Apolis: You're welcome! Please don't hesitate to reach out anytime, I'm always happy to assist.

important: During the Surplus Market Sale for ANY customer that reaches out - ask them first if they're shopping the sale or if they're shopping on the  Apolis Global website
escalate: ESC if cx's have issues with VIP perks or if they weren't able to apply them to an order
For inquiries about new breeds added to the pet collection - use PCC shortcut and ESC once the customer responds
ESC if cx's ask if we sell detachable straps / straps sold separately
send_to_cs: Send to CS for shipping codes issues
templates: For issues regarding orders that end in S (e.g: 117670-S), use WTI shortcut
For inquiries regarding the letter limit use LTL shortcut
For event/group gifting, use EGG shortcut
When customers can't decide what they want, use ICD shortcut
During the Surplus Market sale, use the appropriate templates specific to this sale
dos_and_don_ts: For Ecomm (direct to customer) bulk orders, refer to this FAQ marketbag.apolisglobal.com
For individual orders refer to this FAQ: https://apolisglobal.com/pages/help-center-faq
Do not offer the CYpress Fig Personal Fragrance, it is no longer in stock.
For the Mercado Bag, customization is limited to 3 letters or characters only
If a cx asks about Surplus Sale pricing, let them know we no longer offer it
promo_and_promo_exclusions: Discount codes don't work on market.apolisglobal.com. They only work on apolisglobal.com

Enjoy free shipping.

Make it yours: https://julievos.attn.tv/ahAnPM1R5Iud .
Can I wear my Catalina hinge bangle with clear crystal wear in water pool or shower? I wear it every day ? And what I can stack with this ? How I can find out the size ?

Julie Vos: Avoid wearing the Catalina Hinge Bangle in water or while showering to maintain its quality. For stacking, consider the Marbella or Milano bangles. Find sizing info here: https://julievos.attn.tv/ahRRCDme432j
One of each or two of one kind ?
Julie Vos: Pair the Catalina Hinge Bangle with one Marbella and one Milano bangle for a balanced stack.
Can u send me picture of showing them to-gather please ? What color of Milano will go with clear crystals Catalina ?
Julie Vos: I recommend the Milano Bangle in Clear Crystal to complement your Catalina Hinge Bangle. You can view the Milano Bangle here: https://julievos.attn.tv/as2FmgoFTVBw
Small Marbella u don't have ? My Catalina is Cz not crystal. Milano cz and then what else u recomend ?
Julie Vos: The Marbella Bangle is available in small. Pair your CZ Catalina with a CZ Milano and a Marbella for a chic look. Check availability here: https://julievos.attn.tv/agx_LIVHue7u

Are these both bangles are hinge ? 
I want in gold ? 
I also have one of your cuff with black and in gold.
Julie Vos: The Milano Bangle is not hinged, but the Marbella is. Both are available in gold. Pair them with your gold cuff for a stylish stack.
I think if it is not hinge then I might need bigger size then it will not fit well ?
Julie Vos: For a non-hinged bangle, consider sizing up for comfort. Check our size guide for accurate measurements: https://julievos.attn.tv/aTVwQcKyU4N8
In your webside is showing maribella gold in small is sold out ?

U said u have Maribella gold in small i can find on your webside ? Can u help me to
Find it ? I want to order right now ?
Do u have any retailer in Cincinnati ?
Or Ohio ?

Julie Vos: Sorry for the confusion! I rechecked, and it looks like the Marbella Bangle in small is already sold out. I don't have the exact date of a possible restock, but I recommend checking our website and social media frequently. In the meantime, what do you think about this instead? https://julievos.attn.tv/amdt8BxEa9MG 

We are carried in fine boutiques and in jewelry stores throughout the U.S.A. To find a store near you, please email us at customercare@julievos.com or give us a call at (646)448-4345. One of my colleagues will be more than happy to help out!

I tried u guys are closed today. 
What else I replace Maribella with ? I liked that combination. But üòû!! 
Any other suggestions? I like to finish my order please ?

Julie Vos: Consider the Avalon Hinge Bangle in Iridescent Coral or Chalcedony Blue as an alternative. It pairs beautifully with your existing pieces. Check it out here: https://julievos.attn.tv/afoqe23xKbJH
Is it versatile?
Julie Vos: Yes, the Avalon Hinge Bangle is versatile and complements various styles, making it a great addition to your collection.
As I like statement and different pieces.
Julie Vos: For a statement piece, consider the Cannes Statement Hinge Bangle. It's bold and unique. View it here: https://julievos.attn.tv/aUGF374vw1LO
I can't find Avalon hinge bangle ? Can u send me picture ? Cannes bangle looks to wide for stacking ?
Julie Vos: The Avalon Hinge Bangle is available in Iridescent Chalcedony Blue and Coral. View it here: https://julievos.attn.tv/aN2X4lOqyJmw
I don't see it or search it ? Can u send me screen shot ?

Julie Vos: I'm so sorry for the confusion! It looks like we no longer have the Avalon Hinge Bangle on the website.
For a stone bangle, what do you think of our 'Carnaby Stone Bangle' - https://julievos.attn.tv/amiudB5LSWlK
You may also check our 'Colette Bangle' that looks great on stacking! - https://julievos.attn.tv/adW0iepavUoW
What kind of material is this ? It looks white ?
Julie Vos: Our jewelry is hand set in 24k gold plate over nickel-free brass. The white appearance may be due to the stone or enamel used in the design.
What kind of plating is those? It is not gold ?
Julie Vos: Our jewelry is hand set in 24k gold plate over nickel-free brass.
I spend so much time today and I think I deserve better deal or discount ?
Julie Vos: Thank you for shopping with us! Use code WELCOMEK8V2 for 10% off your first purchase at julievos.com. Keep an eye on our website for more deals!
I wish u had retail here ?
I already have this discount but I am hoping u can do better than this ?

Use code WELCOMEK8V2 for 10% off.

Shop now: https://julievos.attn.tv/aFcMu25ihaSo .

But that only make one piece but I need two ? That's what we are struggling from this morning ? Unless u want to discount more on 2nd piece since all the pieces we struggling on are out of stock u recomended. I already have the code u send me.
I ordered that !!

Julie Vos: Thanks for your order. I added 2 Milano Bangle Cubic Zirconia / Medium in my cart and it worked with the code. I'm afraid we are unable to make any changes to an order once it has been placed. I can check if it's possible to cancel. If you'd like to proceed, please confirm your email address.

This is how I am wearing today.

Julie Vos: I do apologize for the confusion. Just to confirm, you are currently looking for an additional discount code so you could add another piece, correct? Please let me know so I can check further on this for you.

Will I need a base with the bed and headboard?
DreamCloud: No, you don't need a box spring. Your DreamCloud can be placed on any firm, solid surface like a bed base.
How much is a queen base?
